snippet: Last week, a regional director of the National Labor Relations Board ruled that Northwestern football players could be considered employees. What comes next?
abstract: Sports Q&A elaborates on consequences of ruling from the National Labor Relations Board that will allow the Northwestern football team to form a players' union.

byline.original: By STEVE EDER and BEN STRAUSS

lead_paragraph: Last week, a regional director of the National Labor Relations Board ruled that Northwestern football players could be considered employees. What comes next?

headline.main: A Primer on Northwestern Players’ Quest to Unionize
headline.print_headline: A Primer on Northwestern Players’ Quest to Unionize
